injuries.content: 20220822 Texas Rangers: CF Tristan Rojas was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: strained back. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 6 days. 20220822 Minnesota Twins: CL Jordan Walden was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: mild hamstring strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 5 days. 20220823 Arizona Diamondbacks: RP Bobby Dalbec was injured . The Diagnosis: inner ear infection. news.content: 20220822 Miami Marlins: Ryan Kellogg pitches a 2-hit shutout against the San Diego Padres with 4 strikeouts and 2 BB allowed! 20220824 Los Angeles Dodgers: Mario Ram?rez pitches a 5-hit shutout against the New York Mets with 6 strikeouts and 0 BB allowed! 20220828 Philadelphia Phillies: SP Alan Moser honored: Wins the 2022 VSL Outstanding Pitcher Award. 20220828 Chicago Cubs: CL Riger Fernandez honored: Finished 2nd in 2022 VSL Outstanding Pitcher Award voting. 20220828 Philadelphia Phillies: SP Jes?s Olica honored: Finished 3rd in 2022 VSL Outstanding Pitcher Award voting. 20220829 1B Anthony Rizzo of the Cleveland Indians honored: Wins the MLB AL Player of the Week Award. 20220829 RF Steven Moya of the St. Louis Cardinals honored: Wins the MLB NL Player of the Week Award. 20220829 Chicago Cubs: 2B Jhonny Bethencourt honored: Wins the 2022 VSL Most Valuable Player Award. 20220829 Philadelphia Phillies: C Gilberto Moreno honored: Finished 2nd in 2022 VSL Most Valuable Player Award voting. 20220829 Chicago Cubs: SS Zaino Henriquez honored: Finished 3rd in 2022 VSL Most Valuable Player Award voting.
